config.name: ItemTransConfig
config.exportsql: select code,name1,name2,shortname, stocktype,costtype,unittype,i.activestatus,excepttax,accgroupcode,mydescription=isnull(mydescription,' '),stockmin,stockmax,orderpoint, defstkunitcode,defbuyunitcode,defsaleunitcode,groupcode,typecode,categorycode,formatcode, defbuywhcode,defbuyshelf,defsalewhcode,defsaleshelf,deffgwhcode,deffgshelf,defrawwhcode,defrawshelf,defbadwhcode,defbadshelf, rate,p.unitcode,rate1,rate2,running,runner,barcode,barcodename,b.unitcode,i.creatorcode,i.createdatetime,i.lasteditorcode,i.lasteditdatet,workdate=getdate() from bcitem i left join bcstkpacking p on i.code = p.itemcode left join bcbarcodemaster b on i.code = b.itemcode where code ='##PARAMETER##'

config.name: ArTransConfig
config.exportsql: select code,name1,billaddress,workaddress,persontype,memberid,begindate,expiredate,accountcode, taxno,ismaketrans,idcardno,activestatus,telephone,fax,emailaddress,homepage,salecode, typecode,groupcode,pricelevel,taxtype,debtlimit1,debtlimitbal,debtamount,billcredit,transportcredit, creatorcode,createdatetime,lasteditorcode,lasteditdatet,workdate=getdate() from bcar where code='##PARAMETER##'

config.name: ApTransConfig
config.exportsql: select code,name1,address,telephone,fax,idcardno,accountcode,taxno,activestatus, persontype,typecode,groupcode,creditday,creatorcode,createdatetime,lasteditorcode,lasteditdatet,workdate=getdate() from bcap where code ='##PARAMETER##'

config.name: POConfig
config.exportsql: select docno,docdate,taxtype,departcode,apcode,projectcode,creditday,leaddate,iscancel, isconditionsend,ordertoarcode,mydescription=isnull(mydescription,' '),contactcode, sumofitemamount,discountword,discountamount,afterdiscount,beforetaxamount,taxamount,totalamount,netamount, creatorcode,createdatetime,lasteditorcode,lasteditdatet,workdate=getdate() from bcpurchaseorder where docno ='##PARAMETER##'

config.name: CancelPoConfig

config.name: GoodsReceiveConfig
config.exportsql: select docno,docdate,apcode,apname=(select name1 from bcap where bcap.code = ApCode), billtype,taxtype,DepartCode,CreditDay,MyDescription=isnull(mydescription,' '),SumOfItemAmount,DiscountWord,DiscountAmount, AfterDiscount,BeforeTaxAmount,TaxAmount,TotalAmount,PettyCashAmount,SumCashAmount,SumChqAmount,SumBankAmount,SumOfDeposit1,SumOfDeposit2, NetDebtAmount,BillBalance,paybillamount,refdocno,GRBillStatus,GRIRBillStatus, IsCancel, IsCreditNote, IsDebitNote, AllocateCode, ProjectCode, printcount,creatorcode,createdatetime,lasteditorcode,lasteditdatet,cancelcode,canceldatetime,workdate=getdate() from bcapinvoice where docno ='##PARAMETER##' and GRIRBillStatus = 1

select docno,itemcode,itemname,unitcode,whcode,shelfcode,cnqty,grremainqty,qty,price, discountword,discountamount,amount,NetAmount,BalanceAmount, PORefNo,IRRefNo,StockType,LineNumber, allocatecode,ProjectCode,GroupCode,TypeCode,CategoryCode,FormatCode,BrandCode,Colorcode,PackingRate1,PackingRate2, creatorcode,createdatetime,lasteditorcode,lasteditdatet,workdate=getdate() from BCAPINVOICESUB where docno ='##PARAMETER##' order by LineNumber
